==Descriptions==
{{Description|The final resting place of the [[Durin|black dragon]]. The life force exuding from the dragon's core has dyed the steep valley's silvery snow in scarlet red.|Version 1.2 [https://webstatic-sea.mihoyo.com/ys/event/e20201216new/index.html Preview Page]}}

==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* A "{{w|Germanic dragon|wyrm}}" is a serpent-like dragon from Germanic mythology. Over time, its meaning has expanded to include other kinds of dragons, including those with limbs and/or wings.
